Long earrings in plastic and metal with flowers made of sequins and beads.

Long-sleeved dress in velour with a matching Santa hat. Dress with appliqués on the front, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Opening with a hook and loop fastener at the back and faux fur trims around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Dress and hat in velour. Dress with appliqués on the front, an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening, a seam at the waist with an inset faux fur trim and a flared skirt. Faux fur trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined. Hat with a pompom on top and faux fur trim around the hem.
Wide trousers in soft, gently draping silk with a sheen. Covered elastication at the waist and straight legs.
Short, flared skirt in imitation leather with a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned, one-shoulder swimsuit. One wide shoulder strap with decorative gathers, a gently draped effect at the front and gathers in one side.
Fully lined, patterned, one-shoulder swimsuit. One wide shoulder strap with decorative gathers, a gently draped effect at the front and gathers in one side.
Dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Gently tapered waist with a detachable tie belt and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and bum while keeping the skirt in shape. High waist, zip fly and button, and a slit at the back.

Trousers in softly draping mulberry silk with pockets in the side seams, a regular waist with covered elastication, and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a glittery print. Zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a glittery print. Zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short skirt in a soft weave with a high waist and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets, pleats front and back and a concealed zip and button at the back.

Cargo joggers in an airy cotton and linen weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Cargo joggers in an airy cotton and linen weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Set with a hairband and top in cotton jersey and a pair of dungaree shorts in broderie anglaise. Hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front. Top with short sleeves. Dungaree shorts with elastication at the back of the waist, a heart shaped front pocket and straps with a button fastening.
Mesh waist bag to keep your keys and mobile phone in while you are running. Zip at the front and an adjustable elastic strap with a plastic fastener. Size approx. 8x24 cm.
Shorts in softly draping weave made from a silk blend in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Shorts in softly draping weave made from a silk blend in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist and side pockets.

Imitation leather trainers with a print motif, padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an intarsia motif and elasticated tops.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs, including two pairs of hoops. Sizes from 0.5 cm to 6 cm.
Dance shoes with an elastic strap over the foot, motif on the front and appliqués. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and a metal fastening at the front.

Three-strand bracelet of thin metal chains, two with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 18-23 cm.
Wide waist belt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a square buckle. Width 5.5 cm.

Wide, airy tunic in softly draping silk with a round neckline, small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Short sleeves, a gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Wide, airy tunic in softly draping silk with a round neckline, small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Short sleeves, a gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jumpers in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, a tie-front hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a lined, drawstring hood and long sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, a yoke at the back and ribbing at the cuffs.

Shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a lined, drawstring hood and long sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, a yoke at the back and ribbing at the cuffs.

Shirt in soft, checked fleece with a collar lined in woven fabric and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a straight-cut hem.
Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Fitted jacket in a jacquard weave with a sheen. Notch lapels and a fastening with one button at the front. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, covered elastication at the waist and a lined front.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Butterfly sleeves, a smocked seam under the bust and a gently flared lower section.

Straight-cut tunic in an airy weave with a textured finish. Small stand-up collar, V-neck and ties with tassels at the neckline. Wide 3/4-length sleeves with a hem that can be folded down and a tab and button. Gently rounded hem.

Straight-cut tunic in an airy weave with a textured finish. Small stand-up collar, V-neck and ties with tassels at the neckline. Wide 3/4-length sleeves with a hem that can be folded down and a tab and button. Gently rounded hem.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and an embroidered motif at the top. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hems.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and an embroidered motif at the top. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hems.
Short, wide dress in patterned satin with a deep V-neck, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
